{"id":833719402,"question_id":777,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1667184035,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/833719402/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Toeplitz Matrix","memory":"45.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isToeplitzMatrix(int[][] matrix) {\n        int h = matrix.length;\n        int w = matrix[0].length;\n        int min = Math.min(h, w);\n        // int max = Math.max(h, w);\n        \n        \n        for(int i=0; i<h; i++){\n\n            int ele = matrix[i][0];\n            \n            for(int d=0;d<min; d++){\n                \n                if((d+i)<h && d<w){\n                    if(matrix[i+d][d]!=ele)\n                        return false;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        for(int j=0; j<w; j++){\n\n            int ele = matrix[0][j];\n            \n            for(int d=0;d<min; d++){\n                \n                if((d+j)<w && d<h){\n                    if(matrix[d][d+j]!=ele)\n                        return false;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"toeplitz-matrix","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
